text:
huvE tuqrANA$M | 
A yat tRuqpanma#rutO vAvaSAqnAH || 
SriqyasEq kaM BAqnuBiqH saM mi#mikShirEq tE raqSmiBiqsta Rukva#BiH suKAqdaya#H | 
tE vASI#manta iqShmiNOq aBI#ravO viqdrE priqyasyaq mAru#tasyaq dhAmna#H || 
aqgniH pra#thaqmO vasu#BirnO avyAqth sOmO# ruqdrEBi#raqBi ra#kShataq tmanA$ | 
indrO# maqrudBi#r RutuqdhA kRu#NOtvAdiqtyairnOq varu#NaqH sa(gm) Si#SAtu || 
saM nO# dEqvO vasu#BiraqgniH sa(gm) - [  ]  61
